emr_vis_nlp.model

Interface MainModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MpqaColonMainModel, NullMainModel

    public interface MainModel
    Interface which should be implemented by all classes seeking to act as the model in the MVC design pattern for the emr-vis-nlp system.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllAttributes()
      list of all attribute names in model
      java.util.List<Document> getAllDocuments()
      list of all documents in model
      java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> getAllSelectedAttributes()
      list of flags as to which attributes in model are currently "enabled" (disabled attributes should not be displayed in the visualization)
      java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> getAllSelectedDocuments()
      list of flags as to which documents in model are currently "enabled" (disabled documents should not be displayed in the visualization)
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getAttributeValueCountMap(java.lang.String attrName)
      map of all possible values & their counts for a given attribute in the model
      java.lang.String getManAnn(int globalDocId, java.lang.String attrName) 
      boolean hasManAnn(int globalDocId, java.lang.String attrName) 
      void setSelectedAttributes(java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> selectedAttributes)
      enable selected documents in model
      boolean updateDocumentAttr(int docID, java.lang.String docAttr, java.lang.String docAttrVal)
      updates target document's target attribute with the designated value
